results.name: Number A(n,k) of compositions of n where the difference between largest and smallest parts is <= k and adjacent parts are unequal; square array A(n,k), n>=0, k>=0, read by antidiagonals.
maple: b:= proc(n, k, s, t, l) option remember;
min(s, j), max(t, j), j)), j=max(1, t-k+1)..s+k-1)))
mathematica: b[n_, k_, s_, t_, l_] := b[n, k, s, t, l] = If[n < 0, 0, If[n == 0, 1, Sum[If[j == l, 0, b[n - j, k, Min[s, j], Max[t, j], j]], {j, Max[1, t - k + 1], s + k - 1}]]]; A[n_, k_] := If[n == 0, 1, Sum[b[n - j, k + 1, j, j, j], {j, 1, n}]]; Table[Table[A [n, d - n], {n, 0, d}], {d, 0, 14}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 27 2013, translated from Maple *)
